column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bumi says : " You know , this reminds me of a search - and - rescue mission I commanded years ago in the mountains outside of Ba Sing Se . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Here we go . "
#Text=Bumi says : " For five days we scoured the beast of a mountain , fighting our ways through blizzards , sandstorms , and three typhoons .
#Text=" Bumi says : " It was supposed to inspire you .
#Text=Clearly , you know nothing about being a leader of men .
#Text=That 's probably why the Avatar fired you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm sick of your far - fetched tales .
#Text=Three typhoons ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Well , I may have thrown in an extra typhoon or two for dramatic effect , but - " Kya says : " Quit arguing and bring that lantern over here .
#Text=I found footprints .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Come on !
#Text=" Bumi says : " No , follow me !
#Text=This will get us down fifty times faster .
#Text=" Kya says : " Bumi , it 's pitch black and the rocks are slippery .
#Text=You 're going to hurt yourself .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Come on , you wimps !
#Text=If I can do it , it should be no problem for a couple of benders .
#Text=" Kya says : " Fine .
#Text=" Kya says : " You were right , Bumi !
#Text=That was faster !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " At least fifty times faster , by my calculations .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Oh , so Tenzin 's the funny guy now .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " If you need an airlift down , just say the word .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Bah , I do n't need your help .
#Text=I 've got everything under control .
#Text=Agh !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Bumi !
#Text="
